meanings.sent1: Sharing funny videos on social media popularises them among friends.
meanings.sent2: The catchy jingle popularises the new brand of soda.
meanings.sent3: The magician popularises his disappearing act by adding a funny twist.
meanings.sent4: Her infectious laughter popularises the mood in the room.
meanings.sent5: The colorful packaging popularises the product on the store shelves.

meanings.definition: To bring something to the attention of the general public
meanings.sent1: The news article popularises the issue of climate change.
meanings.sent2: The celebrity's endorsement popularises the new fashion line.
meanings.sent3: The quirky advertisement popularises the idea of adopting shelter pets.
meanings.sent4: The bright billboard popularises the upcoming movie premiere.
meanings.sent5: The viral video popularises the dance craze across the internet.
